H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H4872.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Amram<SDBH:עַמְרָם>} and {L:Jochebed<SDBH:יֹוכֶבֶד>}, younger brother of {L:Miriam<SDBH:מִרְיָם>} and {L:Aaron<SDBH:אַהֲרֹן>}; tribe of {L:Levi<SDBH:לֵוִי>}; ► leader of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} during exodus

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3667.def: = man; ◄ youngest son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}, son of {L:Noah<SDBH:נֹחַ>}; ► regarded as ancestor of the {L:Canaanites<SDBH:כְּנַעֲנִי>}

H5307.def: = process by which humans, animals, or objects move from a higher level to a lower level, typically at a high speed and without control

H5045.def: =  an area of land located in the south of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, consisting of little vegetation and with very little annual rainfall; inhabited by numerous peoples - initially by the Canaanites in {L:Arad<SDBH:עֲרָד>} and the {L:Amelekites<SDBH:עֲמָלֵקִי>}, later, the people of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H6285.def: = one of the sides or corners of an object

H4057.def: = area not very suitable for sedentary life and agriculture because of its lack of water; suitable for grazing domestic animals and only inhabited by nomadic tribes and wild animals

H6790.def: = a wilderness area in the {L:Negev<SDBH:נֶגֶב>} on the southern border of {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}, near {L:Kadesh-Barnea<SDBH:קָדֵשׁ בַּרְנֵעַ>}

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H123.def: = man; usually referred to as {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>}; brother of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>}; ► ancestor of the {L:Edomites<SDBH:אֲדֹומִי>}

H5871.def: = one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices

H2592.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ephod<SDBH:אֵפֹד>}; tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; ► chief

H641.def: = garment; reaching from the shoulders to the waist; ◄ made from linen; ► normally worn by {L:priests<SDBH:כֹּהֵן>}, but also by {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>} when the ark was brought to Jerusalem

H5387.def: = someone in a position of high authority in a clan, tribe, or nation

H4519.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3130.def: = man; ◄ eleventh son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and first son of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► father of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>} and {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}, each founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H5387.def: = someone in a position of high authority in a clan, tribe, or nation

H669.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ son of {L:Joseph<SDBH:יֹוסֵף>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

31.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H6535.def: = man; ► father of {L:Elizaphan<SDBH:אֱלִיצָפָן>}, chief; tribe of {L:Zebulun<SDBH:זְבוּלוּן>}

H5387.def: = someone in a position of high authority in a clan, tribe, or nation

H2074.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ tenth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and sixth son of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

31.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H6409.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Azzan<SDBH:עַזָּן>}; chief; tribe of {L:Issachar<SDBH:יִשָּׂשכָר>}

H5821.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Issachar<SDBH:יִשָּׂשכָר>}; ► father of {L:Paltiel<SDBH:פַּלְטִיאֵל>}, chief

H5387.def: = someone in a position of high authority in a clan, tribe, or nation

H3485.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ ninth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and fifth son of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

31.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H282.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Shelomi<SDBH:שְׁלֹמִי>}; tribe of {L:Asher<SDBH:אָשֵׁר>}; ► chief

H8015.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Asher<SDBH:אָשֵׁר>}; ► father of {L:Ahihud<SDBH:אֲחִיהוּד>}, chief

H5387.def: = someone in a position of high authority in a clan, tribe, or nation

H836.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ eighth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Zilpah<SDBH:זִלְפָּה>}, slave of {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

31.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H6300.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ammihud<SDBH:עַמִּיהוּד>}; ► chief; tribe of {L:Naphtali<SDBH:נַפְתָּלִי>}

H5989.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ladan<SDBH:עַמִּיהוּד>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► ancestor of {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושׁוּעַ>}

H5387.def: = someone in a position of high authority in a clan, tribe, or nation

H5321.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ sixth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and second son of {L:Bilhah<SDBH:בִּלְהָה>}, slave of {L:Rachel<SDBH:רָחֵל>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

31.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H428.def: = marker identifying a set of multiple objects with a set that already exists in the mind of the hearers

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H5157.def: = action by which humans or deities take permanent possession of objects, humans, or property, either by inheritance or force

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H3667.def: = man; ◄ youngest son of {L:Ham<SDBH:חָם>}, son of {L:Noah<SDBH:נֹחַ>}; ► regarded as ancestor of the {L:Canaanites<SDBH:כְּנַעֲנִי>}
